questions.text: The **56th International Film Festival of India (IFFI)** was held in **Goa** in 2025. Which of the following was the **Opening Film** of the festival?
questions.solution: The **Opening Film** of IFFI 2025 was **'The Blue Trail'** (Brazil), directed by Gabriel Mascaro. The Closing Film was **'A Useful Ghost'** (Thailand).

questions.text: Who was named the **Women’s World Athlete of the Year 2025** by World Athletics?
questions.solution: **Sydney McLaughlin-Levrone** (USA) was named the **Women’s World Athlete of the Year 2025**. She was also named the Women's Track Athlete of the Year.

questions.text:
During the **23rd India-Russia Annual Summit** in December 2025, a target was set to achieve a bilateral trade of 
 $$USD\ 100\ billion$$ by which year?
questions.solution: Under the **Programme 2030 for Strategic Economic Cooperation**, both countries set a target to achieve **USD 100 billion** bilateral trade by **2030**.

questions.text: In the **RBI’s 5th Bi-monthly Monetary Policy** of FY26 (December 2025), what was the revised **Repo Rate**?
questions.solution: The **Monetary Policy Committee (MPC)** unanimously voted to reduce the policy **repo rate** to **5.25%**. Consequently, the **SDF** was adjusted to **5.00%** and **MSF/Bank Rate** to **5.50%**.

questions.text: India finished in which position in the overall medal tally at the **ISSF World Cup Final 2025** held in Doha, Qatar?
questions.solution: **India** secured the **2nd position** with a total of **6 medals** (2 Gold, 3 Silver, 1 Bronze). **China** topped the tally with 9 medals.

questions.text: What is India's rank in the **Arton Capital Passport Index 2025**?
questions.solution: **India** ranked **67th** in the 2025 Passport Index with a **Mobility Score (MS) of 74**. The **UAE** retained the top spot for the 7th consecutive year.

questions.text: According to the **World Inequality Report 2026**, the **top 10%** of India's population earns what percentage of the total national income?
questions.solution: The report highlights that the **top 10%** of India's population earns **58%** of the total national income, while the bottom 50% receive only 15%.

questions.text: Which Indian cultural element was added to **UNESCO's Representative List of the Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity** during the 20th session held in New Delhi?
questions.solution: During the **20th Session** in New Delhi (December 2025), **Deepavali (Diwali)** was added to UNESCO'S Representative List of the Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity.

questions.text: The Union Cabinet approved the conduct of **Census of India 2027**. What is the total approved cost for this census?
questions.solution: The Union Cabinet approved the conduct of **Census of India 2027** at a total cost of **Rs 11,718.24 crore**. This will be India's **1st fully digital census**.

questions.text: As per the **Swachh Survekshan 2025** report, which city has been ranked as the **dirtiest city** in India?
questions.solution: **Madurai** topped the list as the **dirtiest city** in India in 2025, followed by Ludhiana and Chennai. **Indore** and **Surat** retained top spots among cleanest cities.

questions.text: Which series won the award for **Best Drama Series** at the **53rd International Emmy Awards 2025**?
questions.solution: The award for **Best Drama Series** was won by **'Rivals'** (United Kingdom; Disney+). **'Ludwig'** won for Best Comedy Series.

questions.text: Indian badminton player **Lakshya Sen** clinched the men's singles title at which of the following tournaments in November 2025?
questions.solution: **Lakshya Sen** won the **men's singles title** at the **Australian Open 2025** (BWF Super 500) by defeating Japan's Yushi Tanaka in the final.

questions.text: What was the theme of the **20th G20 Summit** held in Johannesburg, South Africa, in 2025?
options: One Earth, One Family, One Future
questions.solution: The **2025 G20 Summit** was held under the theme **"Solidarity, Equality, Sustainability"**. The 2026 Summit will be hosted by the **USA**.

questions.text: The **2025 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine** was awarded for discoveries concerning which of the following?
questions.solution: The **2025 Nobel Prize in Medicine** was awarded to Mary E. Brunkow, Fred Ramsdell, and Shimon Sakaguchi for their pioneering discoveries on **peripheral immune tolerance**.

questions.text: Which film won the **Best Film** award at the **70th Filmfare Awards 2025**?
questions.solution: **'Laapataa Ladies'**, directed by Kiran Rao, was the biggest winner, sweeping **13 awards**, including **Best Film** and **Best Director**.

questions.text: Who among the following was awarded the **Vigyan Ratna (Posthumous)** in the **Rashtriya Vigyan Puraskar 2025**?
questions.solution: **Prof. Jayant Vishnu Narlikar** was awarded the **Vigyan Ratna posthumously** for his outstanding contribution to **Physics**.

questions.text: The **8th Central Pay Commission (CPC)** recommendations are expected to take effect from which date?
questions.solution: The **8th CPC's** recommendations are expected to take effect from **1 January 2026**. It is headed by **Justice Ranjana Desai**.

questions.text: Which university was ranked as the **world's most sustainable university** in the **QS World University Sustainability Rankings 2026**?
questions.solution: **Lund University** (Sweden) topped the list for the first time with a perfect score of **100**, displacing the University of Toronto.

questions.text: India clinched its **9th Asia Cup title** in 2025 by defeating which team in the final?
questions.solution: **India** clinched their **9th Asia Cup title** with a five-wicket victory over **Pakistan** in the final held at the Dubai International Stadium.

questions.text: According to the **Global Firepower Index 2025**, what is India's rank among the most powerful militaries in the world?
questions.solution: **India** is ranked **4th** globally with a PwrIndx of **0.1184**. The top three are the **USA, Russia, and China**.
